resources.string:
Autostart
 1) Open "Security" and tap "Permissions"
 2) Select "Autostart"
 3) Find "Background Work" and turn on the switch
 
 Battery manager
 1) Open "Settings"
 2) Select "Battery & performance"
 3) Select "Choose apps"
 4) Find "Background Work" and select "No Restrictions" in background settings
 
 Lock the app
 1) Tap "Menu" button to enter "Recents" page 2) Select "Background Work" and lock it

1) Lock "Background Work" in "Recents"
 2) Allow "Background Work" to autostart in Security/Settings > Autostart
 3) Add "Background Work" to exceptions
 4) If you've installed another startup manager, remove "Background Work" from its blocklist
